VIII.iv.2.B.2.e
.
Record Group 407, Strength and Accounting Branch
Record Group 407
,
Strength and Accounting Branch
, has strength returns and lists the following information:
names
service numbers, and
dates of internment.
title: M21-1, Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B - Former Prisoner of War (FPOW) Service Records
citation: Part VIII, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
